response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price tailored specifically for you. Our proposal is to extend the purchase at a price of $1,200,000. We are confident that this offer not only represents a significant savings for you but also aligns with the substantial value this product would bring to your endeavors. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to welcome you as a valued customer.", "product_price": 1200000}
